modules.description: Queries pkg-config for package information using specified flags, returning either the output or a nonexistence indicator. Works with package names and command-line flags to retrieve configuration data. Used to dynamically determine compiler and linker flags for installed libraries during build processes.

Handles C stub linking and multi-library configuration for OCaml projects using ocamlbuild. Processes .c files, generates necessary build directives, and manages library dependencies. Simplifies integration of C code into OCaml builds by automating repetitive setup steps.

Provides functions to integrate Ocb_stubblr with topkg by defining build commands and handling Mirage-specific installations. Operates on Topkg.Cmd.t, Topkg.Conf.t, Topkg.Conf.os, and Topkg.fpath types. Enables building with custom OCamlbuild arguments and installing multi-target libraries for Mirage environments.

Provides dynamic retrieval of compiler and linker flags from pkg-config, enabling seamless integration of external C libraries during builds. Processes package names and flags to return configuration data or indicate absence. Supports automated dependency resolution and build customization. Can locate libraries like libxml2 or openssl and inject their flags into the build system.
